# [Metaframe](https://metapages.org/): code/JSON editor


[![](https://mermaid.ink/svg/pako:eNptUM1qwzAMfhWhw9igfQEPdtl22CgttOw07SBiuTHEdnDkQknz7nPSbTDoSZ_E9yNpxCZZQYPHzH0Lmz1FgCZF548ls_oUPwmflx5cTgE-9htoeWgJv2C9foIgyi5zkPHVek15mg187IveE77N1cAcASnD-2G3JXxYdBfC8cRdkYnwctvlb3hDkIpeI3YL-J8BdxKH_rFGUcQVBsmBva1HjrMtobYShNBUaMVx6ZSQ4lSppbesct0BjeNukBVy0XQ4xwaN5iK_pBfP9WfhhzV9A5k6cQs)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit#pako:eNptUM1qwzAMfhWhw9igfQEPdtl22CgttOw07SBiuTHEdnDkQknz7nPSbTDoSZ_E9yNpxCZZQYPHzH0Lmz1FgCZF548ls_oUPwmflx5cTgE-9htoeWgJv2C9foIgyi5zkPHVek15mg187IveE77N1cAcASnD-2G3JXxYdBfC8cRdkYnwctvlb3hDkIpeI3YL-J8BdxKH_rFGUcQVBsmBva1HjrMtobYShNBUaMVx6ZSQ4lSppbesct0BjeNukBVy0XQ4xwaN5iK_pBfP9WfhhzV9A5k6cQs)


This metaframe shows code or config from the input pipe `[value]` and forwards to the `[value]` output pipe.

Allows editing and "saving" (saving pushes to the `[value]` output pipe).

## Example

Send code (on save) to a downstream metaframe that simply displays the content.

[ ðŸ‘‰ Live example  ðŸ”—](https://app.metapages.org/#?)
